title: Oh Cool. Another Ethnicially Ambiguous Character Turned White in the Rework
body:
First  Ryze and now Eve. 

Can't wait for the Amumu Update where he's unmasked to be a blond-haired blue-eyed zombie.

replies.body:
Hey everyone, We just had a fairly heavy talk about this thread in particular.

The long and short of it is that this is spiraling absolutely out of control. You want to talk about champions and their places of origin? S'cool. No biggie. You want to drag in real-world politics into this that are making an absolute mess of both the discussion and the board? Yeah, we're not putting up with that in the slightest.

We could have deleted this and sent out warnings but we felt it was better to lock this and make this thread an example: Do NOT bring in politics or real-world drama into fantasy land Runeterra. You want to argue, you've got tons of places for it all over the internet. This is not one of them. I, and the many other moderators, expect better from all of you when it comes to this stuff.

Keep this off the boards. Next time, we're going to be escalating this into some bans and time outs.

-Cap
